lenders.name: JENNIFER
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I feel compelled to.  
What courage it takes to step out and say ...
"This is what I want to do ... can you lend me some $ so I can get started."  

I am self employed and in the early stages of my art career.  I have no right to be throwing any money around on extras, like nice dinners and fancy clothes.  

What I'd rather do ... What feeds my soul is using that $$ to help someone build their future.  

You know what I mean ... get their business started.   Like we are both doing it at the same time, just on different sides of the world.  

That sounds way more rewarding then a new pair of earrings.  

Heck! ... that can by 5 pigs in Cambodia!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an artist.  Always have ... always will be.  My "real" name had to have been Crayola in a past life. 

I started my company BuTT UgLee back in 2001.   

What the heck is a BuTT UgLee?
Glad you asked ... 
I'll break this down plain and simple.  
I have characters that run around in my head.  
They all look lost, confused, worried, clueless, giddy, drunk, out of breath, in need of Psychiatric drugs or ... a big, big hug.  

I create each character using muslin, stuffed with polyfill, painted with acrylics and dimensional paint.  If I'm lucky I get to add funky wire, glitter, colored floss and/or an assortment of trim to create dimensional, whimsical and very unconventional wall art. 

An UgLee is truly a piece of art.
UgLees are not plush and not considered a toy.  At first glance they do look like a stuffed animal.  Soft and fluffy ...  Not so!

Once the muslin is painted with acrylics the texture starts to change.  It feels a bit firmer.  Once all the layers of paint and the final sealer are added the muslin (that was once flimsey) feels more like canvas.  This enables the UgLee to hang from the wall or lean on a shelf.

I like to call BuTT UgLee's unconventional, dimensional wall art.  They are whimsical, wild, wacky, unique, hand crafted, original and one-of-a-kind designs.   

 I am simply amazed when I look at all of the places I have shipped my babies.
I have a horse named Denzel in Victoria, Australia.
I spider in Gremany.
A chick and a spider in Singapore.
Two primitive dolls in Middlesex, United Kingdom.
Two angels Honolulu, Hawaii.
My site and Blog have views from 74 different countries!  Are you kidding me?
AND ... Tons of super, loyal collectors in just about every state.
I am humbled.

Kiva works very well.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: It is important to help people to start and develop productive and profitable businesses so that they can be financially independent.
lenders.occupational_info:
Ellen R. Singer, a well-established management consultant, brings her expertise in clinical psychology and finance to BizBuilding, Inc., the ultimate resource for business professionals. Singer has extensive experience managing companies and starting new businesses. Her expertise in finance gives added value to the services she provides.

BizBuilding, Inc. is a New York-based management consulting practice that provides mid-sized companies with the expertise to compete more effectively. The company assists its clients by identifying the points between their business objectives, financial resources and quantifiable tactics that make the most effective use of available resources.

Specialties:
Management Consulting
Business and Marketing Plans
Connection to Financing Resources
Negotiations Leader
Corporate Crisis Intervention
Business Development and Referral Sourcing
Workshops
Business Coaching and Counseling

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: I am encouraged to think that by making even a small loan that I am able to help someone else advance themselves financially and improve their lot in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Before retirement I was in educational administration.  I worked for a private high school north of San Francisco, California.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: every little bit counts.

lenders.name: Frank Davies
lenders.loan_because: I own a small business and know how difficult it is to start a business, or finance an expansion .   I hope that these small loans will help make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We print for large and small companies.   We print on T-shirts, mugs key chains banners of all colors including vinyl banners and full color large size banners, and much more.  We also do embroidery and digital printing.

lenders.name: Tiffany Michele
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much that I don't deserve and I want to be a blessing to someone else. Jesus said in Mathew 25:40, “Truly I tell you, just as you did it to one of the least of these who are members of my family, you did it to me.”
lenders.occupational_info: I watch God's precious gifts, two year olds with lots of energy! I also am a singer and the wife of a worship pastor so I spend a lot of time in music ministry :)

lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help people!

lenders.occupational_info: I wear many hats on my job, but most of the time I mediate differences and help people that can't, aren't willing or don"t know how to help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe that everyone on Earth should have a home, enjoyable livelihood, health care, nutritious food and enough wealth to ensure their children's security. May you all be blessed 1,000 times!
